nodes.text: The Ahia-Ko were an ancient species and civilization which lived on the planet Akiva. Constructing great temples in the planet's jungle wilderness, they believed that water from the planet's special canyons was so pure, it could take one’s sins away and leave them a better person. As a result, one of the oldest feats of architectural engineering was located near the waterfall of the Witch's Finger, named after a odd-looking cliff on the world.
